record.properties: Top = 220 Left = 1 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 90 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_batch" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_batch" Name = "Cursor1"
DoCreate = .T. Caption = "SERVER BATCH FILES" uniqueid = 835DC860D29E43059AC6F2D59C1E9B8F Name = "MR_BATCH" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Resize Local aheight, atop
m.aheight =(Thisform._editbox1.Height - 12 * 2) / 3
m.atop = Thisform._editbox1.Top
*!* With Thisform._editbox2 *!* .Anchor = 0 *!* .Top = m.atop *!* .Height = m.aheight *!* .Anchor = 11 *!* Endwith
*m.atop = m.atop + 12 + m.aheight
With Thisform._editbox3 .Anchor = 0 .Top = m.atop .Height = m.aheight .Anchor = 9 Endwith
m.atop = m.atop + 12 + m.aheight
With Thisform._editbox4 .Anchor = 0 .Top = m.atop .Height = m.aheight .Anchor = 9 Endwith
m.atop = m.atop + 12 + m.aheight
With Thisform._editbox5 .Anchor = 0 .Top = m.atop .Height = m.aheight .Anchor = 9 Endwith
ENDPROC

record.properties: Anchor = 11 Height = 108 Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange Lparameters nColIndex
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" Anchor = 15 Height = 276 Left = 12 ToolTipText = "INSTALL SERVER BATCH FILE" Top = 216 Width = 456 ControlSource = "mr_batch.btext" Name = "_editbox1"
FontName = "Consolas" Anchor = 11 Height = 48 Left = 12 ToolTipText = "START SERVER BATCH FILE JAVA PARAMETERS" Top = 156 Width = 936 ControlSource = "mr_batch.javaparams" Name = "_editbox2"
Top = 0 Left = 900 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "-Dmixin.debug.export=true" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand6"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local javaparams1, javaparams2
m.javaparams1 = alltrim(strextract(mr_batch.javaparams, '', ' -jar '))
m.javaparams2 = '-jar ' + alltrim(strextract(mr_batch.javaparams, ' -jar ', ''))
if '-Dmixin.debug.export=true' $ m.javaparams1
m.javaparams1 = alltrim(strtran(m.javaparams1, '-Dmixin.debug.export=true', ''))
else
m.javaparams1 = m.javaparams1 + ' ' + '-Dmixin.debug.export=true'
endif
replace mr_batch.javaparams with m.javaparams1 + ' ' + m.javaparams2 in 'mr_batch'
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC
